fs.fibu2.data.event
Interface JournalListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener, ReadingPointListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AccountInformationListModel, AccountListModel, BilancialTreeModel, CategoryListModel, EntryDialogFactory, JournalAdapter, JournalChangeFlag, JournalTableModel, JournalTimeSeriesCollection, ReadingPointModel, YearListModel, YearSeparators
public interface JournalListener
extends ReadingPointListener, java.util.EventListener

All objects listening to changes in an fsfibu2 journal implement this interface

Author:
Simon Hampe

entriesAdded

void entriesAdded(Journal source,
                  Entry[] newEntries)
This is called, whenever some entries are added

Parameters:
source - The journal to which the entries were added
newEntries - The added entries

                    Entry[] oldEntries)
This is called, whenever some entries are removed

Parameters:
source - The journal from which the entries are removed
oldEntry - The removed entries.

entryReplaced

void entryReplaced(Journal source,
                   Entry oldEntry,
                   Entry newEntry)
This is called, whenever one entry is replaced by another

Parameters:
source - The journal in which the replacement took place
oldEntry - The old entry
newEntry - The new entry

startValueChanged

void startValueChanged(Journal source,
                       Account a,
                       java.lang.Float oldValue,
                       java.lang.Float newValue)
This is called, whenever a start value is added, removed or changed

Parameters:
source - The journal in which the change took place
a - The account for which the value was changed
oldValue - The old value. Null, if the value was newly added
newValue - The new value. Null, if the value was removed

This is called, whenever a reading point is added

Parameters:
source - The journal to which the point was added
point - The new point

readingPointRemoved

void readingPointRemoved(Journal source,
                         ReadingPoint point)
This is called, whenever a reading point is removed

Parameters:
source - The journal from which it was removed
point - The removed point

nameChanged

void nameChanged(Journal source,
                 java.lang.String oldValue,
                 java.lang.String newValue)
This is called, when the name of a journal is changed.

Parameters:
source - The journal whose name was changed
oldValue - The old name
newValue - The new name

descriptionChanged

                        java.lang.String oldValue,
                        java.lang.String newValue)
This is called when the description of the journal is changed

Parameters:

newValue - The new description
